CustomField.description: NICC-052490 This is the name (label) of the profile that will be temporarily assigned to users who currently have the standard "Salesforce" License Type. The Amadeus Password Policy does not allow users to change their passwords more than once in a 24 hour period. This is set at the Salesforce Profile level. There is a specific Salesforce profile that allows resetting of passwords more than once in a 24 hour period. That profile should be entered in this field.
CustomField.label: Password Reset Profile - Salesforce
